group_1.narration: "Kyubey, I want the power to make you@and your kind unable to interfere with@the Automatic Purification System forever!"

group_1.textLeft: If you make a contract,@you'll share the same fate as us!

group_1.textRight: It's okay. I believe in you.
I'm sure that, once you control the Purification@System, Magical Girls will have a brighter future.

group_1.textLeft: How unexpected. Did you foresee@that this would happen?
However, even if you use@that wish to get rid of me,
there's no guarantee that Ui Tamaki will be able to@fully control the Automatic Purification System.
The current situation may prove irreversible.
are you truly willing to offer up your soul?

group_1.textRight: I don't need to hear any lectures from you.
There's only one thing that I need from you,
and that's for you to grant my wish!

group_1.textCenter: Your wish has been granted, Kagome Satori.
<I heard everything, Kagome!>
Huh?! Aru, did you just speak?!
<You and I are one and the same,@so it's only natural.>
<Now come on, let's hurry@and save all Magical Girls!>
Right!

group_1.textRight: [voiceFull:fullvoice/section_103205/vo_full_103205-5-21_aru][chara:102000:voiceFull_fullvoice/section_103205/vo_full_103205-5-21_kagome]This Automatic Purification System@is filled with everyone's hopes.

group_1.textCenter: Yeah!
I think I'm connected...yeah...@It's working.

group_1.textRight: There's something in Kamihama City@that's interfering with it!

group_1.textCenter: Don't worry, Ui. You can leave it to me.
They shouldn't be able to stop you anymore,@so you should be able to leave them be,
but if they're going to interfere all the way to the@end, then I'll have to use my power to stop them!
Thanks, Kagome!@Thank you, Kagome!
Leave it to me!
I can tell where Kyubey is.
<Kagome!>
<I'll do my best too, so let's@fly to the center of town.>
Huh, what do you mean?
<I mean, this!>

group_1.narration: "Hyaaaaaa!"

group_1.textCenter: "Just like this, we'll clear them@out from the sky with our power.>
<It won't get rid of every@Kyubey in the world, but...>
Yeah, maybe he'll keep his head down for a while.
<Alright then, let's go!>
Yeah! Ready, and...!

group_1.narration: ―Kagome―@GOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!
―Aru―@<My leaves will seek out Kyubey@and slaughter him!>
―Kagome―@Aru, your strategy@was a big success.
―Kagome―@I think I can feel the interference with the@Automatic Purification System being suppressed!
―Kagome―@...Hey, Aru.@Do you think I made the right wish?
―Kagome―@Did I use it properly for@the future of Magical Girls?
―Aru―@<If it's the answer that you came up with yourself,@Kagome, then I'm sure it's not a mistake.>
―Kagome―@Really?
―Aru―@<After all, Kagome, lately you've been talking@on your own without relying on me, haven't you?>
―Kagome―@Huh?
―Aru―@<If you didn't notice, that's even better.@You were able to speak in your own words>
―Aru―@<You've grown up!>

group_1.textCenter: Please...I want to change, too...@From being timid and having to be protected...
When I transferred schools, I was so lonely...@All I could do was cry.
All I could do was wait for@someone to reach out to me...!
So I want to be Kagome Satori for someone else...!
For Iroha and her friends@who saved me from Witches,
and for all Magical Girls!!
I see... I've finally been able to live up@to the feelings I had back then.

group_1.textLeft: Now, if you just head on in from here,@you'll finally reach my private room.

group_1.textRight: So all I have to do is hand over your@memories and you'll be va bene.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, and I'll show you ultimate destruction.
Our timing is just right, so we should@be able to really make it happen.

group_1.textRight: So it'll be a marvelous spettacolo, then?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, since I'm not only feeling@the joy of me returning to myself,
but also the rage at being@betrayed by someone important.

group_1.narration: [textRed:WriTten oATH]@[textRed:i, sWeaR, tO,]@[textRed:dEstR, oY, mAgiCal GIrLs]@[textRed:nAme:_______]

group_1.textRight: I don't know...@I don't know anything about Magical Girls...

group_1.narration: [textRed:WriTten oATH]@[textRed:i, sWeaR, tO,]@[textRed:dEstR, oY, mAgiCal GIrLs]@[textRed:nAme:_______]

group_1.textRight: It'll be okay if I just write here...?
If I write my name here...

group_1.narration: That was the beginning.
The first event that tied me to the fate@of Magical Girls, the beginning of the story of@the story of how I, Kagome Satori,@became someone who lives for others.
Right here and now, there are only five more@futures for Magical Girls that I am able to share.
There are others that I was unable to introduce,@but we all continue to dream of the@future with hope in our hearts.
[textBlack:―Interview Record―]@[textBlack:Yozuru Sasame]

group_1.progressNarration: [textBlack:  "It's difficult for me to answer@  questions about my future.@  I'm still just doing my best trying@  to learn coordination, and I don't@  yet have the confidence to lead@  a normal life myself..."]

[textBlack:  "I can't help with what I lost,@  but even were I to regain@  compassion for others, my own@  anguish would turn me into a Witch.@  So all I can do is learn how to live@  without causing trouble for others."]

[textBlack:  "However, since Teacher told me@  not to rely solely on notes,@  I've started trying to make@  decisions based on my instincts,@  and I feel that I've gotten a@  better grasp on when to be kind."]
[textBlack:  "For example, if an insect were@  to land on Sudachi's arm, I@  wouldn't think anything of it.@  Even knowing that an insect@  bite hurts, I wouldn't think@  anything of it."]
[textBlack:  "But then I realized that if I can@  anticipate negative@  consequences, I could try@  to stop them from happening."]
[textBlack:  "So, although I'm only halfway@  there, I'd like to hone my senses@  a little more, and live life@  with dignity once again."]
[textBlack:  "Yes, even though this is a small@  thing, it is my goal for the future.@  I believe it will be the first way@  I can repay Teacher and Sudachi."]

[textBlack:  "Also, if I can come to understand@  kindness, I would like to face my@  mother's feelings again. I'd like to@  compare her thoughts when I was@  born with her thoughts when@  she died..."]

group_1.narration: [textBlack:―Interview Record―]@[textBlack:Sudachi Sawa]

group_1.progressNarration: [textBlack:  This text was translated by Miss Yozuru,@  who was also present at the interview.]
[textBlack:  "Livia might get mad at me@  for saying this, but I don't@  think I have the right to@  have hopes for my future."]
[textBlack:  "A lot of kids died because of@  my wish, and I can't bring back@  the lives that have been lost."]

[textBlack:  "Even if I could wish for something,@  I don't think it would come true. If@  you know Kyubey, you understand.@  When you make a wish and distort@  the laws of nature, there won't@  be a happy outcome..."]
[textBlack:  "So, all I can do is keep going.@  I can't turn a negative number@  into a zero, but I can at least@  become a better person."]
[textBlack:  "I really want to get closer to@  Mii, the first friend that@  I ever made. No matter what my@  past is, she's waiting for me,@  believing that I can get better."]
[textBlack:  "...Yozuru and Livia are the same,@  but... Sometimes I feel like there@  are steep cliffs on all sides, and@  there's no on that can help me."]
[textBlack:  "They're probably cliffs of sin...@  that no amount of good deeds@  can help me scale..."]
[textBlack:  "But lately I've been thinking@  it's okay if I don't make it all@  the way to the top. I just need@  to climb a little ways up so that@  I can reach the people I care@  about."]

group_1.narration: [textBlack:―Interview Record―]@[textBlack:Alexandra Kurusu]

group_1.progressNarration: [textBlack:  "Oh my, thank you very much@  for taking the trouble to@  come visit me at home♪"]
[textBlack:  "I had some advance notice, so I@  prepared these teacakes for you.@  We can eat together, if you'd like.@  Hmhm♪"]
[textBlack:  "That said, I'd heard rumors@  about you for quite a while, so I@  already have my answers in mind."]
[textBlack:  "I know this is a very simple and@  obvious answer, but I just hope@  what we're afraid of never comes@  to pass, and that Magical Girls@  can be saved..."]
[textBlack:  "I won't be able to envision my own@  future unless that happens first."]

[textBlack:  "From singing, which I enjoyed even@  when it was hard, to this harp@  I've been playing my whole life,@  to my studies that will@  determine my future―@  it all feels so insipid now..."]
[textBlack:  "Although I may be beyond@  salvation, I at least think it@  would be nice if watching me keep@  trying could inspire sickly or@  otherwise disadvantaged@  children."]
[textBlack:  "But nobody knows about Magical@  Girls, do they? Which is why I@  don't think I can use this@  misfortune of mine to help@  anyone right now..."]

[textBlack:  "Since I've already had a wish@  granted, some might say I shouldn't@  ask for anything more― but even@  if we can't be saved, it may be@  meaningful enough to simply@  spread the word about us."]
[textBlack:  "Hmhm. So I'm rooting@  for you, alright?♪"]
[textBlack:  "What you're doing could mean@  you can create a future for us,@  despite our misfortune."]

group_1.narration: [textBlack:―Interview Record―]@[textBlack:Urara Yume]

group_1.progressNarration: [textBlack:  "Hrmm...@  It's really tough@  to say what I want..."]
[textBlack:  "Since I moved close to Futatsugi,@  it'd be nice if I could keep workin'@  together with Promised Blood."]
[textBlack:  "I still sorta feel like more@  of a fan than an official member,@  though. That's why I feel a@  little out of place, see."]
[textBlack:  "But y'know, I also wanna get@  back into showbiz so I can@  support my family again."]
[textBlack:  "My parents were fine with me@  quittin', but I still wanna@  be useful to them, see."]
[textBlack:  "And I don't care if she hates me―@  I wanna get up on stage with@  Kurara again."]
[textBlack:  "But I don't think she's@  ready yet, so...@  Ah, see, I got it!"]
[textBlack:  "If Magical Girls can live just a@  little longer, I wanna hone my skills@  outside of the diabolo and@  continue performing, even if I@  gotta go it alone."]
[textBlack:  "Once I grow up, I wanna talk@  to Kurara again. See, if our@  hearts have changed, maybe we'll@  be able to communicate this time."]
[textBlack:  "Then we'll get back together@  and show everyone the best@  street performance we got!"]

group_1.narration: [textBlack:―Interview Record―]@[textBlack:Rabi Himuro]

group_1.progressNarration: [textBlack:  "Do we have a future?@  Can we really be saved?@  It's absurd to ask us these@  questions when we're asking@  ourselves the same things as@  we watch over this battle."]
[textBlack:  "...I'm sorry.@  You asked me so considerately,@  and I was rude to you."]
[textBlack:  "It's like asking someone who's@  been given one year to live where@  they see themselves in ten."]
[textBlack:  "...Indeed, it's not that we don't@  want for anything; rather that@  we suffer because we're@  thinking of the future."]

[textBlack:  "I'd like to take over the inn@  my mother runs, and boost the@  popularity of the vegetables my@  grandfather grew for me. I would@  also like to go to university to@  deepen my understanding of my@  father's book collection..."]
[textBlack:  "Truly, the more I dream, the more@  I hope for, the more the sadness@  of having such little time left@  to live gnaws at my heart."]
[textBlack:  "Maybe trying to cling to the@  future in spite of it all is what@  makes us human, though."]
[textBlack:  "For starters, understanding the@  concept of time creates a fear of@  death, envy for the future, and@  so on and so forth, which in@  turn spurs us to act."]
[textBlack:  "The word 'society' was invented,@  and the reason why humans kill@  and harm one another is because@  we know what 'time' is, which@  gives rise to emotions such@  as impatience."]
[textBlack:  "Since I may have nothing left,@  it's not unusual for me to@  have given up on it all.@  It's normal not to take action."]
[textBlack:  "And yet, I have a vegetable@  garden in my yard.@  That alone gives me my answer."]
[textBlack:  "It tells me I still want a future..."]
